name: The Last Cookie
description:
Please wait while your game loads...

Compatible with Windows, Mac, Chromebook, and Linux browsers, this adventure is free with no advertisements (however we do accept donations to help keep the lights on). The intent of its creation is to increase interest in reading for elementary students with minimal graphics. Suitable for all ages, each chapter is designed with language geared toward ages 6-9 reading for approximately 15-20 minutes on their own.

Thanks for playing our first game. This is a work in progress with more chapters, books, and optimizations coming. 

CREDITS
Concept: Ronan
Edit: Michael Gurley & Rocci Hudecek
Playtest: Remi, Dominic, Matthew, John John, & Luke
